subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: T. J. Oshie and Alexander Steen scored shootout goals, lifting the St. Louis Blues to the top spot in the N.H.L. standings with a 3-2 win over the host Minnesota Wild.
snippet: T. J. Oshie and Alexander Steen scored shootout goals, lifting the St. Louis Blues to the top spot in the N.H.L. standings with a 3-2 win over the host Minnesota Wild.
